title: The Russian
description: MY PRISONER. MY OBSESSION. MY SUNSHINE.I can't stay away from her.I don't care if I get whacked by the mob. Or fired from the FBI.There's no way I'm letting her get hurt.Hell, if any of them touch her, I'll blow my cover in a second.She's my solnishko.Her brother's a scumbag. He owes the don money.The don sends me to collect my pound of flesh, but I want more than a pound.I want her.
author: Renee Rose
